titles.title: To provide for the disposition of the Space Shuttle Discovery upon retirement.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

committee.name: House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Space and Aeronautics.

bill.summary: 4/15/2011--Introduced. Requires the Space Shuttle Discovery to be displayed at the Space Center Houston in Houston, Texas, for a period of 15 years after its retirement from service, after which time it shall be returned to Washington, D.C.
